msbt.message: I had a buncha fun the other day! Invite me over again sometime. I'm real curious about the secret rooms I haven't seen yet!
I had so much fun hanging out at your place the other day! I promise I won't tell nobody about the secret room I found! I wanna see what's inside next time!
Thanks for showing me your place the other day. If you ya wanna clean up the stuff that was on your floor, you should use this thing!
Your house was so neat! Next time I'm over, can ya teach me how to use that furniture that was facing the wrong way?
It was cool seeing your house. I thought maybe you could use this. Furniture is kinda my thing. That, and bugs. And snacks. A lotta things are my thing.
Your house was so nice! I have this thing that I think would look real neat with your things. I am giving it to you so you can put it with your things.

It's real fun hanging out at friend's houses! You can pretend like ya live there. And you can think, "Man, there's way less hand prints on these walls." OH! Here's a thing for YOUR walls. It's not a hand print.
Your place has so much rare stuff, it's like a museum! I didn't touch anything! (Blathers always says no touching.) I hope I can come by again! (I won't touch anything!)
You have so much expensive stuff in your house! I was worried I'd break things, so I tried to keep track of my body all the time. But I got you a present just in case I forgot where my body was.
Thanks for having me over the other day! I had loads of fun. Your place seemed a bit empty, so take this! I hope ya like it!
A huh huh, you're like me! You don't like cleaning up either! But ya gotta, I guess. That's what my mom and dad always said! Here! Maybe this will help ya! I'm done not using it.
Thanks for the other day! It was so cozy at your place that I stayed for a real long time! I'm sending you a thank-you gift. I hope you like it! Let's hang out again!
